events.message: I received my order yesterday but unfortunately I want to request a refund because the product does not meet my expectations and I would like to return it.
System identified keywords related to refund and return from customer message and categorized this case as Refund.
The support case has been assigned to an agent specialized in refunds and returns to handle the query efficiently.
Hello, thank you for contacting us. Iâ€™m here to assist you with your refund request and ensure the process goes smoothly.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for your refund request so I can start processing it for you?
My order number is 123456789 and the reason I want a refund is because the item looks different than described on the website.
Thank you for the information. We will initiate the refund process immediately and you will receive a confirmation email shortly along with instructions to return the product.
Thanks for the prompt response and clear instructions. I appreciate the help and will follow the steps to return the product.
Your refund case has been successfully processed. The payment should be credited back to your original method within 5-7 business days.
Checking in to confirm you have received your refund and if you need any further assistance from our side.
Since your refund was completed and no further issues were reported, we are closing this support case. Thank you for your patience.
